May 15, 1948 D Edinburgh Charities Contest
Edinburgh Charities Contest 0 Other
edinburgh-charities-contest
Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Usher Hall, Edinburgh, City of Edinburgh, Scotland, UK Best section 2 band - Kilsyth Miners. Best section 3 band - City of Edinburgh. Best section 4 band - Whitburn Miners. 15 bands competed.
Feb. 19, 2019, 1:58 p.m. Dec. 17, 2019, 1:08 p.m.
1 Parkhead Forge (Glasgow) George Hawkins Tchaikovsky [arr. W. Rimmer]
2 West Calder Public Band Charles Telfer Les Preludes [arr. Rimmer]
3 Kilsyth Miners' Welfare George Hawkins
4 Newmains George Hawkins
Unknown Result City of Edinburgh Band John Faulds
Unknown Result Shotts St Patrick's Brass Unknown L'Africaine
Unknown Result Whitburn Band Herbert Kearsley
